programme.desc: The kids of Pontypandy join Moose Roberts on the last night of his month-long charity sleepout challenge. But when James tries to break Moose’s ‘foraged-food only’ rule by toasting a marshmallow, he ends up starting a forest fire!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When the PA system blows out and sparks a fire at the Pontypandy Fun Run, it’s all hands-on deck to stop the spreading flames!

programme.title: Franklin And Friends
programme.desc: The Super Cluepers try to find a bunch of carrots that have gone mysteriously missing from the Rabbit family garden. But they finally realize that taking your time to think things through one step at a time is more fruitful than going for the easy answer. They even find the missing carrots – in a freshly baked carrot cake they are all invited to enjoy! /Its better to tell the truth even if its hard to say. Franklin pretends to like pickles to spare Beaver’s feelings, but she gets the wrong idea and thinks he loves them. It’s only when the dreaded pickles start to get in the way of his and Beaver’s friendship that Franklin realizes he has to fess up.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Its the first day of summer, which badgers celebrate and call Happy Poppy Day. Edmund wants to prepare Yolanda’s delicacies, a sweet specialty, which Scoutbadger, Woodsy and Berry’s mother used to bake on that day using poppy flowers. To make these delicacies, you need poppies, the recipe and thecontainers in which they should be served…

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky is invited to his cousins home in Megalopolis. Sketcky is very happy to visit this city full of people and cars. To avoid traffic jams in this big city, Doodleboo has an idea.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: On one of Sketckys holiday photos, Doodleboo and Sketcky discover an egg in a nest. But the nest is not in a tree. Doodleboo will show Sketcky what this strange animal is, that lays eggs and does not fly.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: While Doodleboo and Sketcky sunbathe, Sketcky wants to know more about the sky, clouds, and space! Doodleboo has the idea of a Riddleboo that will reveal all the secrets of the universe to Sketcky...

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty shows Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave how to take perfect photographs of Speedy Sheep, Sneezy Sheep and Little Lamb for their aunt’s photo album. But there’s so much to remember to get that perfect shot: make sure your subject is happy and smiling, frame your picture with the subject in the centre, don’t cover the lens and hold your camera steady to avoid getting blurry images!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty, Tweet and Dave help Ruff-Ruff make up a story about pirates! Captain Ruff-Ruff, Pirate Dave and Princess Pirate Tweet go in search of treasure on Desert Island, singing a pirate song as they go. Ruff-Ruff want to dig for buried treasure, but his pirate crew find a treasure chest, filled with all their favourite things, aboard a real pirate ship! The pirates agree to share the treasure and Hatty records Ruff-Ruff’s story in a special storybook.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Summer is at its hottest and Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse want to run and play but the sun is just too hot and strong. That’s until Little Grey Squirrel gives them both a wonderful present, big leafy parasols. When he later changes his mind and takes Little Nutbrown Hare’s parasol back, the little hare is naturally disappointed. Can the friends find a way for all of them to be happy?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: You Summer in the meadow is a great time to find tasty snacks to eat. Big Nutbrown Hare seems to know all the best tricks and hiding spots for the yummy treats and Little Nutbrown Hare can’t help but wish he was as big and smart as his father. However, he soon finds out that there are some things a little Nutbrown Hare can teach a Big Nutbrown Hare.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: On Summer’s hottest night Little Nutbrown Hare finds it hard to sleep. When a swim in the river isn’t enough to cool him down, Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends ask Little White Owl to tell them a really cold and sleepy bedtime story. Will she come up with a story that can make them feel cool and finally get Little Nutbrown Hare off to sleep?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is vooshing with Hoppity around the garden, making him fly higher and higher. With one particularly enthusiastic throw Hoppity disappears. After a hunt, Bing finds Hoppity in the washing up bowl and gets upset because a wet, mucky Hoppity just doesn’t feel right.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and his friends play Nature Explorers in Ammas garden by spinning a giant colour wheel and then finding something of that colour in the garden.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing has enough money to buy one thing in Padgets shop but he finds it hard to choose between all the lovely things. After much deliberation Bing chooses a campervan but on the way home he begins to regret his decision.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its bedtime but wheres Hoppity? Bing remembers playing with him in the garden so Flop finds a torch and together they set off in the dark for an adventure.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: If you get stuck, you need some help and then you can get down by yourself.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Leapy, the grasshopper girl, gets paint on her hair while painting her house in the spring. She can’t wash it off, so Zephyr, the dragonfly, offers to cut her hair. Leapy is very sad when she sees herself in the mirror; she doesn’t like her new hairstyle. At Zephyrs suggestion, they show the others, but only Dolly notices the change and compliments her. Later, they hold a hairstyle day, where everyone creates special hairstyles for themselves. Leapy happily finishes painting her house and invites her friends to a spring feast.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Stanleys birthday is approaching, and he becomes very curious and can’t wait to find out what gift he will receive from Dolly. He peeks into the ladybird girls drawer. The next day, he tells Balthazar that he knows what his gift will be. On his birthday, the friends gather and wish Stanley a happy birthday. Flutter presents the cake, they sing, and then Stanley blows out the candles and cuts the cake. Stanley receives many nice gifts, including a bowling set from Dolly. Stanley admits that he peeked into the ladybird girls drawer because he was curious about his gift.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Shaun invites his friends to Sand Island during the summer heatwave. Christopher and Chloe, the two canaries, ferry the friends over. Bubble, Balthazar, Dolly, Stanley, Berry, Flutter, and Shaun build sand houses. Balthazar accidentally knocks down Bubble the flower beetles house. Suddenly, a summer shower begins and washes away all the sand houses. They stand sadly around their ruined creations and decide to build a large drip sandcastle together. Side by side, they build drip towers, construct castle walls, and decorate the tops with sand balls. The day passes joyfully, and by the evening, when the canaries come to pick them up, magnificent drip towers stand tall on the island.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: At the end of summer, the Star Girl visits her friends. She rarely comes because her star-shaped house is in the sky. They spend a day together, and when night falls, the Star Girl bids everyone farewell. She can’t speak, but she plays the harp beautifully. The music will lift her house into the sky. However, this time one of the harp strings comes loose, and the house doesn’t rise. The Wind blows the string out of her hand, and she can’t catch it.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids find some numbered papers blowing around the park. After investigating several possibilities of where they could be from, they finally figure out they were once fastened to trees in the park as part of a self-guided tour to celebrate Arbor Day. / When all the milk in Huckle’s Dad’s store turns out to be sour, Huckle, Sally and Lowly set out to find out why.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Parrot is couching Monkey, after some jumping jacks Parrots asks him to kick a punching bag. Monkey tries but keeps falling out of balance; each time he kicks he falls back… Mole appears and tells them of the donkeys famous precise kick. Monkey is enthused to learn his technique and off they go to the farm.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The Wildmen of Pontypandy are trying to carry a massive log through the woods. But when Moose tries to lighten their load by floating the log in the river, he gets swept up and dragged downstream towards the waterfall!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Dilys takes her eye off the stove for a split second, the Cut Price Store catches on fire, trapping Norman upstairs!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate’s dad gives her a big empty box to play with! In Mimiloo, Tack can’t think of any new inventions—his Big Idea Board and his Big Idea Box are empty. To help Tack get out of his inventing slump, Kate and Mim-Mim have to help him imagine all the things that his empty box can become.

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate discovers that Mom finished sewing Mim-Mim on the day Kate was born, so they share a birthday! In Mimiloo, Kate and Mim-Mim secretly set out to throw each other surprise parties. They each try to make it the very best party for the other, which means altering their friends’ party plans, disappointing their friends and making a gigantic mess!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Tchoupi and Nina come across a waddling hedgehog while they’re playing in the vegetable garden. When their moms explain how beneficial these cute little creatures are to gardens, the two friends decide to do everything they can to make the hedgehog feel at home among the vegetables… Until the little animal… disappears!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: When T’choupi comes down for breakfast this particular morning, he finds the kitchen in a total mess! Nina comes and tells him that the vegetable garden has also been turned upside down! Who could possibly have done this?... At first, they suspect Ciboulette the cat… until they find out that the culprit is a super cute newcomer.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia have decided to play doctors to help their friends stuffed animals and heal dolls hurts. Dr. Julia and Sam, her nurse, pay visits to some of them in the Mouse Mansion.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam, Julia, and the other kids in the Mouse Mansion read the adventures of Magic Mouse, a magazine hero. But one day, some of them are helped by Magic Mouse who seems to really exist...

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Rupert builds a tree from wood instead of cutting one down. Soon, everyone wants one too, and the friends are so busy they forget the Advent celebration. The children decorate and save the day.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Eliott has read about a lot of world records: the world’s oldest person, the highest jump or even the longest beard! How incredible! The Triplets decide to break their very own record. However, it is easier said than done and it seems that pretty much all records have already been broken, which means that they are going to have to be extremely creative. Who knows, maybe they will break the silliness record?

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Turbulent is quite upset! In a fit of jealousy, he accuses Mom of always serving more food to Poet than him. Mom decides to tell them the story of Boum and Baboum, two bear-cubs who were very jealous of each other and who decided to pay a visit to their Grandfather. One of them had a cake in his bag and, the other, a bottle of lemonade. During the walk, they got thirsty and hungry but found it impossible to come to an agreement and share their supplies. In the end, a fox ends up eating most of the cake... Leaving them barely anything. A good way to be cured of ones tendency to jealousy.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie dreams of winning this years Raffle prize: a set of colored paints! So when she learns that the Cats intend to cheat in order to win it, only to waste it away… she makes a bad decision: she’ll be cheating too.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou tries skateboarding again after falling the first time!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou gets to choose one toy from the store, but there are so many cool toys to pick from!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Gordon is late to pull the Express the Fat Controller gives it to Henry instead. Because Gordon has said how difficult his work is, Henry doubts he’s up to the job but more than proves himself and all the passengers love him. Gordon is left to take over Henry’s work, which he thinks is beneath him, and he ends up going on strike. The Fat Controller insists Gordon pulls the Flying Kipper as penance but Gordon refuses till Henry makes Gordon think the job is too hard for him, spurring Gordon to prove Henry wrong

programme.title: Chuggington 04
programme.desc: The defect detector is a device that lets Vee know if there’s anything wrong with chuggers as they pass by its scanners. Unfortunately, it seems to be malfunctioning! Eddie takes it off to the repair shed and Emery, wanting to be helpful, takes its place. But, worried that he might miss something, Emery sends nearly everyone to the repair shed, creating chaos in the depot! Emery feels bad that he’s caused so much work for Vee and wishes he could make up for it. He has an idea. If the detector could talk, it wouldn’t have to do everything through Vee. Dr. Ling and Eddie think it’s a great idea and they update the detector so that it speaks. And they know the perfect voice to use - Emery’s!

programme.title: Chuggington 04
programme.desc: Eddie is having a very busy day and Hodge really wants to help - but all the jobs need hands not wheels. When Wilson reports the track lift is malfunctioning, Hodge decides to try to fix it himself. He only makes matters worse, bringing the lift to a grinding halt with Wilson stuck on it! Eddie agrees to let Hodge go and fetch the lift part needed, as long as he uses Dr Ling’s Chugnav to guide him on his journey. Unfortunately, Action Chugger has knocked the satellite, which has skewed the signal, leaving the Chugnav talking utter nonsense!

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Charley is worried because a nanny he doesnt know is coming to pick him up. Luckily, the new nanny - Emilie - is really nice! The next day, its Bens turn to be worried because this evening, its a nanny he doesnt know whos coming to pick him up too. Until the boys discover that its... Emilie! Charley grimaces: he cant believe his eyes!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave are excited about going to school to learn new things. When the teacher fails to show up, Hatty invites Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave to take it in turns at being teacher themselves. They have fun sharing facts about dogs, birds and bananas, and by the end of the day are amazed by how many interesting things they already knew!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Who never has to go to the dentist? Doodleboo explains how to draw a crocodile.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: While on a forest hike, Jayden discovers a wounded red fox kit. Leo, Katie, and Hero engage in an animal sound-guessing game in the garden. Jayden calls them, alerting them of the injured fox. In the treehouse, the computer provides information on red foxes, emphasizing their distinctive sounds. They reach the forest, where Jayden gains the kits trust, and they bandage its wounded paw. Attempting to reunite the kit with its mother, they encounter challenges in producing the correct fox sounds. Ranger Rocky calls Ranger Joey who educates them on the variety of fox vocalizations. The team now knows which sound to play on Katie’s tablet while locating an animal nearby but it turns out to be a coyote. They fend off the coyote with growling fox noises. The kit runs towards another barking sound and it turns out it’s its mother! Mission accomplished. Back in the garden, Hero is looking for Katie who is imitating a fox sound but with Leo’s help, Hero successfully pounces on Katie.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly 05 Mepe
programme.desc: Berry the snail and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They have many adventures, while they make new friends and get knowledge about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the forest hold a baking contest to celebrate the arrival of summer, but Dr Owl goes overboard with tasting. With the help of Beetle Bodobács, they manage to save the evening with chimney cakes and dancing. The next day, Dr Owl apologizes and improves his mood with a group workout.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: On a rainy day, Dollys house gets flooded. When the rain stops, Stanley, the stag beetle, repairs the roof. Berry also helps Dolly, who is upset about her soaked drawings. Berry visits Raymond, the copper beetle, who has plenty of bells. He asks for two special bells to cheer Dolly up. At home, he makes coconut balls and later delivers them to Dolly along with the bells, which make her very happy. Later, Berry paints over the stain caused by the rain, and Dolly repaints the pictures with the help of Flutter and Leapy. The bells bring joy to the house.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Flutter, the butterfly girl, catches a cold on a gloomy, rainy day. Doctor Owl examines her and advises her to rest a lot in bed. Her friends visit often to take care of her, and Flutter always asks them to read from her new book. Soon, everyone knows the story, which tells of a ball held in a splendid castle. One day, Balthazar makes Flutter sad by saying that the princess story is just a fairy tale. Flutter turns away, disappointed, and falls asleep. Balthazar meets Doctor Owl, who notices that something is bothering him.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Mama Owls chicks are born, and soon they are strong enough for Berry and Dolly to visit them. Doctor Owl asks for their help while he works. The owl babies are very lively, and Berry and Dolly play with them enthusiastically and patiently. At lunchtime, Mama Owl is running out of patience, but eventually, they manage to feed the chicks. After finishing lunch and resting a little, the little ones regain their energy. They happily jump around Mama Owl, who feels it is time that the chicks learn to fly.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When Bing and Sula feed the ducks in the park, Sula stands quietly but Bing is boisterous.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its snack time for Bing so Flop suggests they make a smoothie. When Bings carrot accidentally gets put in the blender, hes upset to disover he cant have it back.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula help Flop water plants in the garden. Bing finds a frog and wants to keep it, so he and Sula decide to build her a little house with a bucket. Sula and Bing prepare a cozy house with food and a bed, but the frog doesnt like the new house so it hops away. Where can she be?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants to play his car park game, but Charlie is visiting and keeps messing it up.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop play shadow tag until it starts raining and Bings shadow is outside getting wet.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Apples rave review on her berryweb page of Strawberrys new dessert starts a booming mail order dessert business for Berry Bitty City. When Strawberrys stuffed-up nose makes her bake a bad-tasting cake, Apple, afraid the truth will hurt Strawberrys reputation, proclaims its delicious. The fib snowballs when the Queen of Berryvania reads Apples review and orders Strawberrys new cake for her ball. A madcap chase ensues as Apple tries to stop the airmail postal bees from delivering the cake.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: As the snow and the cold have settled outside, the Fox-Badger family must remain within the warmth of the burrow. A blessing for the four practically hibernating badgers who spend their time yawning and napping! As for Rosie, she hates staying indoors: the little vixen needs to spend her excess energy!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Its Little Field Mouses birthday and Little Nutbrown Hare wants to give her exactly the right gift. After a moment’s thought he realises he has no idea what to give her. Big Nutbrown Hare encourages his son to think about everything he knows about his friend. He remembers she likes to look nice on her birthday, so her makes her a lovely necklace and she is delighted!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare keeps winning a game with Little Field Mouse, and enjoys it so much he doesnt realise she is frustrated with losing. Big Nutbrown Hare helps him realise that winning is less important than making sure everyone enjoys playing the game. So Little Nutbrown Hare invents a new game that Little Field Mouse and her twin siblings can enjoy playing too.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Alfonso, the cricket, finds a strange little fish in the stream, which turns out to be a lost polliwog. Although Alfonso is sad when the polliwog returns to its frog family, their friendship doesnt end. Alfonso visits his tadpole friend every day, who soon develops into a real little frog.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Which child will get the big spoon for the annual fondue held in memory of the very first residents of th Mouse Mansion. Sam and Julia are in competition, will their friendship hold up?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Julia is angry with Sam who stepped on her tail. Sam hurt her and she lost her balance. Julia doesnt want to talk to him anymore! As best he can, Sam tries to make up with his friend.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: In Grandpa’s garden, Turbulent is fascinated by the super heroes’ stories he can read in his book. He wishes too to be a Kind Vigilante who saves the lovely and the helpless. Unfortunately, every time he tries to save someone, his sister who stucked her kite in a tree or his brother who is afraid of a spider for example, Grandpa always comes first and fixes the problem. When Turbulent was at the most discouraging point, a new villain appears ant kidnap all the people he loves, the Kind Vigilante is back in business!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are playing in the park when Mommy calls them because it’s time to go home. When they arrive she asks them if Toto is not with them but the Triplets thought he was already with Mommy! What a disaster! Toto is lost! It’s the total panic, the Triplets are desperate and worst, the park is about to close! Everyone starts to look for Toto, Grandpa makes the tour of the neighborhood, Mommy hangs signs everywhere and calls the Police. We absolutely need to find him !

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: The trainees learn that with a little imagination any ordinary job can be extraordinary.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The Wildmen of Pontypandy are trying to carry a massive log through the woods. But when Moose tries to lighten their load by floating the log in the river, he gets swept up and dragged downstream towards the waterfall!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Dilys takes her eye off the stove for a split second, the Cut Price Store catches on fire, trapping Norman upstairs!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate’s family trip to the zoo is canceled when it starts raining. In Mimiloo, Kate and Mim-Mim help their pals make their own zoo animals out of bushes and hedges. But after a spritz, the animals come alive, and things quickly get a little too wild!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate needs to find four purple buttons for plushy Mim-Mim’s new sweater, but there are so many to look through, it’s going to take a long time. In Mimiloo, Gobble uses Tack’s Copy-Zapper to duplicate popper peach trees so he can make the biggest batch of popper peach jam ever. But things get messy when Boomer duplicates himself!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou is frustrated when he can’t score a basket in his new basketball hoop. After pretending he’s in charge of a space mission, guiding a shuttle pilot (Mommy) into a moon crater, Caillou learns to slow down and take a breath. This helps him finally score a basket!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: When Caillou cant get the steps right to a block party line dance, he worries he’ll ruin the dance for everyone. But Grandmas story about square dancing for a famous square dance caller (Caillou) helps Caillou overcome his anxiety and dance the night away.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Connor is one of the fastest engines that visits the Island of Sodor, and is proud that he is always bang on time! But one day one of his coupling rods breaks and nearly derails him. Connor is shocked. He’s never broken down before and decides that he must have been going too fast. Even after he is fully repaired he is too worried to go fast and travels so slow that Thomas overtakes him pulling the local. Thomas wants to help his friend, but it is Stephen who finally convinces Connor that he really does want to go fast again.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers discover a Kakapo that wishes to fly! Theres just one tiny problem - its the worlds only flightless parrot.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A Dung Beetle mistakes Heros ball for its own dung ball. Can the Junior Rangers help get Heros ball back?

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat and Jess visit Wales to pick up a suit of armour and hear all about King Gilbertson!

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The lighthouse needs a new lightbulb delivered, but lightbulbs are delicate...

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Coco shows Bing how to do really good Big Boos and together they make Flop jump. When Bing tries out his new tricks on Charlie he finds out the power of Boo has to be scaled down for babies.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula discover a new toy at Amma’s crèche, a talking ride on car. It seems like fun until Talkie Taxi keeps saying the same thing over and over again. When the taxi crashes and is finally silenced Bing and Sula use their imagination to play a game they really want to play without being dictated to by the noisy taxi.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its a windy day, and Bing wants to fly his Hoppity Voosh kite with Flop.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: It’s bath time and Bing just can’t help adding a few more quirts of bubble goo…and a few more….and a few more, until he gets more bubbles than he can handle.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing goes to play with Sula who is engrossed in a game of ‘sparkle magic’ when he arrives. Bing wants to play too but Sula finds all sorts of reasons why Bing can’t play with her special sparkly things. Amma suggests that Bing makes his own sparkle magic stone but disaster strikes when Bing accidentally spills Sula’s precious sparkle dust.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald is playing the piano, with Weenie beside him, when they hear a drip drip dripping noise. Oswald investigates only to discover it is a leaking tap in the kitchen. Oswald tries to fix it with his spanner but the pipe bursts and water floods Big City!

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald, Weenie and Henry decide to spend the day together, and set off for Madame Butterfly’s Diner. Henry orders fish fingers - just like always on a Monday - but Oswald orders the Monday Surprise. It turns out to be the best meal of all! Oswald exclaims ‘I guess you never know!’ delighted that life is always full of surprises. As their day goes on, Henry and Oswald encounter many more happy surprises but Henry gets the biggest one of all when his friends throw a birthday party for him – eight days early! Henry finally admits that life is much more fun when…you never know what’s going to happen next….

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Mila is appearing on the children’s TV game show, “Whiz-A-Quiz”, the rest of the Spring City Rockets are disappointed that they didn’t get tickets to watch and support her. This gives Mayor Madison the idea for Bob to build an outdoor movie area at the Stadium where everyone can watch the game show together. But when Mayor Madison asks Lofty to help the Spring City Rockets decorate the stadium, he gets carried away and leaves Leo to finish the support frames for the giant screen all by himself. A job that is too big for one person. When the giant screen arrives, the frame isn’t sturdy enough to hold it and the whole structure starts falling apart. Lofty races in and saves the TV screen but the frame, stage and audience seating are broken.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: JJ and Mila are training for a snowboarding stunt show to be performed at the opening of the Winter in Spring Festival - a celebration of winter in Spring City. Bob and the team will be building a triple chairlift to transport passengers to the top of Observatory Hill. But Bob isn’t keen on the cold weather - he’d much prefer to be building sandcastles on the beach! During a work break, Skye offers Bob a snowboarding lesson - and he’s terrible! Meanwhile, Scoop is determined to have a slide down the snowy hill - but Wendy warns him that without snow chains, he’ll have no control. Scoop can’t resist... and ends up sliding all over the slope and crashing into a support beam, causing the chairlift cable to jump off the wheel tracks.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse go on a long trip with Big Nutbrown Hare to find some food he hid away during the warmer months. Little Nutbrown Hare plays with a stick along the way, which turns out to have many uses, one of which is helping them find the food and another is finding their way home again.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is very proud of a Christmas Tree he has built from pine cones. So proud, that when Little Field Mouse accidentally knocks it over he has trouble forgiving her. When he makes a mistake of his own, Big Nutbrown Hare forgives him immediately, and he understands how important it is to forgive.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Seeing his tracks in the fresh snow inspires Little Nutbrown Hare to create a new game called ‘snow seek’. The friends have a lot of fun creating tracks for Little Nutbrown Hare to follow, but Little Redwood Fox’s tracks completely disappear and so does she. When Big Nutbrown Hare reports that Little Redwood Fox was sighted walking backwards, they work out how she managed to trick them all.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Timmy likes football. What other things does Timmy like?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Huckle and the gang race all over Busytown trying to find the lock that fits and old key they found. They search everywhere from the Busytown Museum to Mr Gronkle’s antiques. They come up empty until they remember that an old roll top desk was being delivered to the antique store near where they found the key and had a lock on it. They try the key and it fits. / Chocolate sauce on Lowlys car leaves Huckle and the gang puzzled.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is throwing some awesome moves on the kitchen counter, dancing with his drink bottle in one hand. When he bounds into the garden and opens the drink, it fizzes out over the top and nearly all of it goes on the floor! He wonders why that happened, so he goes to Okido to find out! When he lands, Zoe and Felix are staring up at the sky because hundreds of birds are all flying in the same direction.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: Messy is making a new jigsaw puzzle in his bedroom and it’s of a dinosaur. “I’d love to see a REAL dinosaur,” he says. He wonders why he’s never seen one… So off he goes to Okido! Messy lands in Zoe and Felix’s garden and cartwheels down the path to catch up with them. Zoe and Felix are carrying sandcastle equipment – Messy picks up Felix’s bucket and puts it on his head. “What’s this?” he asks, “A new hat?” Felix and Zoe laugh and invite him to come to the beach with them. Messy speeds off in excitement!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Apple isnt paying attention when Strawberry describes their campout tradition of telling Tall Tales. So Apple tells her thrilling adventure of a wild road rally she entered, only to surprise the girls by proving the story is actually true.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry decides to imitate his Mum by becoming a newspaper reporter for the day.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: When Harry is disappointed that he cant have what he wants for breakfast he goes to Dino-world.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Farah, navigating the scorching Thar Desert, finds Hardwickes Spiny-Tailed Lizards seemingly braving the intense heat. Concerned for their well-being, she contacts Leo and Katie who are in the garden about to commence in a water gun chase but are interrupted when Hero steals the water gun. Upon consulting the computer, they learn that the lizards need sunlight to regulate their body temperature. During the call, a falcon appears and scares the lizards back into their burrows! Leo, Katie and Hero fly to the desert to help the lizards find a way to stay in the sun without being harmed by the falcon. Attempting to aid them, they construct a tent, only for it to crash to their disappointment. They meet with Ranger Rocky who seeks advice from Ranger Joey, they discover the importance of sunlight for these cold-blooded creatures. A lizard approaches the rangers, trusting them enough to be around them when suddenly the falcon swoops in towards it! Hero intervenes to protect the lizard from the falcon and it flies off. With Ranger Rockys assistance, they come up with a new plan to keep the falcon away instead of protecting the lizards. With CDs hung on a tree, it reflects light which scares the falcon. The lizards can now safely bask in the sun, marking the success of the mission. In the Treehouse, a water gun fight ensues between Leo and Katie.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas misses his best friend Percy while working on the Chinese railway.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: A new tunnel-boring machine called Darcy arrives on Sodor. She has come to work on the new road being built by Miss Jenny’s Construction Crew and is eager to impress her new friends. She makes several mistakes, and worries she doesn’t fit in with the other engines. Nia encourages Darcy to be herself and she soon makes up for her mistakes when everyone sees what she can really do!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: As every year, Maria is set to take part in the pizza contest. But she sprains her wrist at the last moment and, unable to cook, cant participate. So David asks Grisu to cook in her stead. Its the perfect mission for Grisu, who loves pizza (and his father even more). Maria instructs him – and Stella – on how to make the Pizza Nonna, according to her grandmothers recipe. But things go haywire, Grisu unwittingly ends up tied to the ceiling fan, spinning fast, kicking everything and making a mess in the kitchen, plus he burns the recipe. As all hope seems lost, Grisu, who never gives up, has Maria sing a lullaby, which makes her remember the recipe. Thanks to that, they make the best pizza ever and go on to win the contest.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Toramento has to decorate Dragontown with flowers for its yearly ball. But as he got the flowers delivered too late, he wont be able to finish his task on time. So David asks Grisu to help out Toramento and be his assistant gardener. The young dragon is in charge of making flowerbed depicting a volcano in the town square – even though Fume would rather have his son use cactuses instead of flowers. Things dont go exactly as planned. First, the soil is too hard, and then Thingy unearths most flowers Grisu and Stella have managed to plant.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: It’s a fine Autumn day and it seems that all of the meadow creatures are out enjoying the sun. Little Nutbrown Hare is surprised that Big Nutbrown Hare knows every single creature in the meadow. He sets out to trick him into believing there is a brand new animal… called a ‘Grrr-umph’, which he cleverly creates out of shadows! Will Big Nutbrown Hare be tricked?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare discovers that everyone else can whistle but him… the birds, Little Grey Squirrel, Otter and even the wind in the river reeds. Inspired by the wind, he practices really hard and eventually learns to blow through a reed himself to make it whistle. He and his friends make a beautiful and eerie whistling symphony amongst the reeds.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their Town Crier badges, Wilson and Brewster each have to make an announcement, speaking loudly, clearly and with style. Brewster is too quiet and nobody listens to him. Wilson is loud and clear, but he exaggerates! Having failed their first badge attempt, Wilson and Brewster decide to help each other. Brewster teaches Wilson how to stick to the facts and Wilson gives Brewster pointers on announcing with pizzazz. They both earn their badges on the second try!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie wants to give her brothers a surprise afternoon snack in the forest. She needs Lucien, Loudo’s father’s help. He will accompany them to the wild bees nest that she has found. However, Berry’s unexpected presence will threaten Rosie’s plans.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob must finish a Dinosaur Park attraction for the Mayor to visit that evening. This involves creating a trail around which life-sized models of dinosaurs will be positioned, climaxing with a roaring animatronic model of a triceratops. Muck starts to clear the main path. He’s fascinated, but also a little bit scared of dinosaurs. Leo reassures Muck by revealing he too was a bit wary of dinosaurs when he was small, and gets Muck to roar like a dinosaur. The model dinosaurs arrive and are very impressive. Scoop decides to surprise Leo and pushes the triceratops into the middle of the path. Instead of surprising Leo, they spook Muck who panics and knocks the model over a cliff.

programme.desc: Sum liður í mentanardøgunum í Sunda kommunu skipa tjørnuvíkingar fyri einum túri út í Stakkin. Í ár toku teir 14 seyðir. Túrurin er serstakur, og áhugin fyri honum er sera storur. programme.title: Linde á Langelandi
programme.desc: Konteynarahylurin tekur skap, og tað sama ger dreymurin um ein storan vatnrusjibana. Í royndini at fíggja slíkar dreymar byrja Sofie og Joakim at selja úr húsinum. programme.title: Størst - Jesu føðingardagur
programme.desc: Peter Ingemann er farin jolaferð til Ísraels at ganga í Jesu fotasporum. Ferðin byrjar við Føðikirkjuna í Bethlehem, har Jesus varð føddur - og endar við Gravkirkjuna í Jerusalem, har Jesus doyði á krossinum.

programme.title: Et si on se rencontrait ?
programme.desc: Suivez les incroyables histoires d’amour de ces couples qui ont craque virtuellement l’un pour l’autre, et qui se rencontrent pour la première fois en vrai. Ces amoureux virtuels vont passer du fantasme à la realite et leurs histoires vont, comme toujours, vous faire vibrer. Au programme : de l’amour bien sûr, avec des coups de foudre dès le premier regard et des baisers passionnes au bout de quelques minutes en face-à-face, mais aussi d’enormes deceptions… Une chose est sûre, le passage du virtuel au reel ne vous laissera pas de marbre !

programme.title: Meteo
programme.desc: La meteo de M6 vous fera decouvrir un lieu en France symbolique du derèglement climatique ou des solutions apparues pour le combattre. Sur place, Gennifer Demey, Cali Morales et Stephanie Duval vous expliqueront les causes de ces perturbations climatiques et leurs consequences sur les paysages, la faune, la flore et les habitants de ces endroits de France concernes par le sujet.

programme.title: La roue de la fortune
programme.desc: De nombreux candidats vont tenter leur chance pour denicher les mots et expressions caches, tout en esperant decrocher les plus gros gains offerts par la roue. Mais attention, ils devront eviter la redoutable banqueroute et les autres pièges qu’elle reserve. Chaque jour, les participants se donneront à fond pour vivre des moments palpitants et atteindre la finale, où ils pourront remporter jusqu’à 20 000 euros ou un voyage de reve à l’autre bout du monde.

programme.title: La meilleure boulangerie de France
programme.desc: Curieux de decouvrir les talents des boulangers partout en France, Norbert Tarayre chef cuisinier et Bruno Cormerais, Meilleur Ouvrier de France Boulanger, repartent sur les chapeaux de roues et nous embarquent sur les routes à la recherche de la meilleure boulangerie de France ! Un veritable road-trip les attend à la decouverte des coutumes et des traditions de 9 regions : Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, Bretagne, Bourgogne-Franche-Comte, Grand Est, Hauts-de-France, Île-de-France, Normandie, Nouvelle-Aquitaine et Provence-Alpes-Côte dAzur. Cette annee, vous allez decouvrir 90 boulangeries ; à lissue du voyage, 9 dentre elles seront selectionnees pour participer à la grande finale nationale et, à la cle, le titre de Meilleure Boulangerie de France 2019 !

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent
programme.desc: Un jury compose de professionnels du spectacle part à la recherche dun incroyable talent, tout domaine confondu (chant, danse, arts du cirque, etc.).

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent
programme.desc: Un jury compose de professionnels du spectacle part à la recherche dun incroyable talent, tout domaine confondu (chant, danse, arts du cirque, etc.).

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent, ça continue
programme.desc: Avec son dynamisme et son humour, Pierre-Antoine Damecour nous emmène dans les coulisses de lemission, va à la rencontre des artistes marquants de chaque soiree - des plus talentueux aux plus emouvants en passant par les plus loufoques - et nous devoile des images inedites des talents et du jury.

programme.title: Les incroyables talents sont eternels
programme.desc: Retrouvez une selection des meilleurs candidats passes sur la scène de La France a un incroyable talent. Durant leur passage, ils ont su faire vibrer le jury et le public grâce à leur talent extraordinaire! Ce sera l’occasion egalement de redecouvrir d’anciens talents sortis depuis de l’anonymat.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: Produits frais, recettes novatrices, cuisine conceptuelle, Philippe Etchebest met son talent et sa franchise au service de restaurateurs en difficulte... mais encore faut-il que ces derniers se remettent en question et acceptent ses critiques aiguisees.

programme.title: Cauchemar en cuisine
programme.desc: Cest à Muret, à quelques kilomètres de Toulouse, que Martine a passe un veritable appel au secours au chef Philippe Etchebest. Son mari Joël tient un restaurant depuis 11 ans, mais aujourd’hui, à plus de 70 ans, il s’epuise à la tâche. Malgre tous ses efforts, les clients se font de plus en plus rares et Joël ne peut pas se verser de salaire. Le moins que l’on puisse dire, c’est que dans ce restaurant dedie aux produits de la mer et aux poissons, le chef est alle de surprises en surprises...

programme.title: Bruno Walter | Portrait
programme.desc: The film portrays Bruno Walter (1876-1962), one of the most important conductors of the 20th century. The Italian biographer Michele Selvini speaks about the musician Bruno Walter who formed the musical life of the capitals of Europe and the United States over a period of 60 years. But so far not published film material also shows a different, not so known Bruno Walter as a private man.

programme.title: Mozart: Piano Concerto no. 12 - Vladimir Ashkenazy
programme.desc: The 13-part Mozart on Tour series chronicles the journey of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart across Europe. This broadcast features the first three episodes of this series, taking us to London, Mantua, and Bologna. In the first episode, Vladimir Ashkenazy performs as both soloist and conductor in Mozart’s Piano Concerto No. 12, KV 414, accompanied by the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra. The second episode features soloist Heidrun Holtmann as she performs Mozart’s Piano Concerto No. 1, KV 37, and Piano Concerto No. 4, KV 41. Holtmann is accompanied by the Orchestra della Radiotelevisione della Svizzera, led by Marc Andreae. In the third episode, Andreae and his orchestra return for a performance of Mozarts Piano Concerto No. 5, KV 175, featuring Malcolm Frager as the soloist.

programme.title: Strauss: An Alpine symphony - DSO Berlin, Robin Ticciati, Reinhold Messner
programme.desc: Richard Strauss 1864 - 1949 Eine Alpensinfonie. Berlin, Tempodrom, 2021. Recorded at Berlin’s Tempodrom, the Deutsche Symphonie-Orchester Berlin and its chief conductor Robin Ticciati present Richard Strauss’s ‘An Alpine Symphony’ as a musical and philosophical mountain hike with the legendary mountaineer Reinhold Messner. The concert leads us through the Alps, lets the audience pass flowering meadows en route, through thickets and underbrush, over mountain pastures and glaciers to the summit, and finally the descent surrounded by thunderstorms. Messner provides insights into the physical and psychological borderline experiences of his mountain ascents and speaks about extreme situations, the perception of nature, and his mental state on the night before departure, during the conquest of the peak, during the long, onerous descent and the exhausted, contented return home.. Directed by Andreas Morell.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Veronica behover bykvinnornas hjalp for att mota sin radsla att hugga ner stora trad. Sam och Squibb kammar noll med natet och tillgriper sportfiskemetoden for att fånga farsk fisk. Oliver river taket på sitt skjul for att installera regnvattenuppfångning. Carl och Morgan tar annu ett steg med sitt eviga hem genom att anlagga en tradgård från grunden.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Medan de utforskar Egyptens episka maktkamp med sina sodra rivaler, nubierna, upptacker arkeologer i Karnak anmarkningsvarda ledtrådar som avslojar hur kushitiska kungar tog kontrollen från en dynasti i forfall. Djupt inne i ostra oknen gors extraordinara upptackter i gamla smaragdgruvor.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer inleder nya utgravningar I Pompeji for att avsloja berattelser om dem som levde och dog dar. I en kamp mot klockan finner de ett offerkranium, avslojar ledtrådar från en gravkammare och en mumifierad kropp tillhorande en mystiskt rik, frigiven slav, och ger sig in i smala tunnlar under det kommunala badhuset.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: I San Ysidro, varldens mest trafikerade landgransovergång, upptacker polisen fentanyl, heroin och kokain gomt i ett fordon. Senare genomfor ett team från Homeland Security i Miami en hemlig operation mot en illegal vapenliga. Under tiden inspekterar gransvakterna på Dulles International Airport kurirer efter en serie narkotikabeslag nyligen.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: I Miami inleder granspolisen en operation for att spracka en knarkliga och utlamna en misstankt kokainhandlare från Colombia. På Atlanta International Airport beslagtar granspolisen forfalskade lakemedel, medan Mobile Enforcement Team i El Paso tranar sina nyaste rekryter.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Barnstensrummet ar en av varldens mest vardefulla forsvunna konstskatter. Efter att ha stulits av nazisterna och gomts vid Östersjokusten forsvann det under de sista krigsmånaderna. Upptackten av ett skeppsvrak med en stor hemlig last leder forskarna till mysteriets karna och avslojar en bortglomd tragedi från 1945: varldshistoriens storsta evakuering till havs som får aven Dunkirk att blekna.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz reser till Huddersfield for att radda en VW Corrado från 1992, en tysk coupe som på sin tid var en av de snabbaste familjebilarna. Bilen tillhor 37-årige Ashley, en inbiten bildåre. Nar Ashley blev sjuk borjade hans ogonsten tyvarr ruttna bort, och nu hoppas hans fru Kristina att en fullt återstalld Corrado ar det som hennes make behover mest av allt for att återfå flytet i tillvaron.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz ger sig av till Rochdale for att radda en Opel Manta GTE, en sallsynt tysk klassiker från 80-talet. Bilen tillhor den forre amatorrallyforaren Alan, som alskade sin Manta så hogt att han inte ville gora sig av med den ens nar den korde av vagen.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: I borjan på kriget har de befogenheter inom politik, polis och sakerhet och de ar ansvariga for byggandet av koncentrationslagren som kommer att bli platser for de varsta grymheter varlden någonsin skådat.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: Tyskland ar på frammarsch och Hitler har planer på varldsherravalde. Han ser stridsskeppen som den ultimata symbolen for sitt nya Tredje rike, och beordrar två fartyg att byggas om så att de ar storre, kraftfullare och mer bevapnade an någonting tidigare skådat på havet. Men Storbritannien kommer inte att sky några medel forran Hitlers nya megavapen ar forstorda.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Hadrianus mur ar den storsta strukturen som romarna någonsin byggt. Den strackte sig 11 mil over Storbritannien och definierade en gång den norra kanten av det storsta imperiet som varlden hade sett. Nu undersoker experter muren, dess fort, porthus och garnisonsstader, for att avsloja hur civilisation och kultur vaxte på Roms vilda grans. Deras overraskande upptackter visar hur livet - och doden - var på imperiets dynamiska och standigt foranderliga kant.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Efter en tids varma temperaturer kan bossen Thord dra en suck av lattnad nar det borjar snoa. I snostormen åker en 20 ton tung lastbil av vagen och en bil ner i ett dike. Thord beslutar sig for att radda dem. Han behover alla jobb han kan få for att hålla foretaget på fotter. På Bjorns territorium fastnar en forare i ett bergpass. Han har glomt att satta på snokedjorna, vilket irriterar Bjorn.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: I takt med att dagarna blir kortare och temperaturen sjunker måste invånarna i Port Protection måste forbereda sig infor den svåra vintern i Alaska.

programme.title: Prehistoric Women
programme.desc: Vi foljer videofotografen Clothilde Chamussy och arkeologen Randall Haas nar de studerar vetenskaplig forskning som avslojar ny information om kvinnornas roll i de forhistoriska samhallena.

programme.title: Vikingarnas krigardrottningar
programme.desc: Den gangse uppfattningen har alltid varit att vikingakrigarna var man, men nu utmanar nya upptackter allt vi tidigare trodde oss veta. National Geographic-upptackaren Ella Al-Shamahi anvander modern teknik och banbrytande vetenskap for att bevisa existensen av elittrupper av kvinnliga vikingakrigare som levde och stred for over 1 000 år sedan.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Nar Northwest Airlinks flight 5719 kraschar upptacker utredarna ett orovackande monster som orsakats av manniskorna ombord.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Nar en pendlarflight till Detroit slutar i en fruktansvard dodsspiral ar det upp till utredarna att avgora orsaken och forhindra att det nånsin upprepas. Nar de genomsoker vraket efter ledtrådar kommer de till ett uppseendevackande resultat.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Under en natt med kaos, krascher och konvojer blir Thord upprord nar ett annat foretag tar sig in på hans territorium. I norr tar Ole Henrik med sig foretagets nya bargningsbil på dess forsta uppdrag att radda en lastbil som kraschat djupt ner i ett snotackt dike och sedan slagit runt 90 grader. Ole Henrik ar ivrig att testa den nya bargningsbilen for att se om den ar vard den stora investeringen.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Mitt i natten blir Thord och Erlend skramda nar de forsoker radda en skåpbil som kraschat intill en kyrkogård. Nar de drar skåpbilen uppfor en istackt, brant backe fruktar de att deras nasta destination kommer att vara kyrkogården. Även i soder ger Bjorn nyborjaren Jan Erik en gammaldags lektion i hur man blir en riktig raddningsarbetare.

programme.title: Challengerkatastrofen
programme.desc: I det har specialprogrammet tar vi del av rymdfarjan Challengers tragiska ode. Vid uppskjutningen exploderade den under en pågående livesandning.

programme.title: Vikings: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: “Silkesvagen” oppnade upp en handelsvag for skandinaverna i Öster. På jakt efter fler rikedomar attackerade vikingarna – i oster kallade ”ruser” – Konstantinopel år 860. ”Ruserna” blev ett permanent och fruktat inslag i det bysantinska riket.

programme.title: Vikings: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: Belagringen av Paris år 885 var kulmen på vikingarnas invasioner av Frankerriket. Vi tar oss en titt på de upprepade vikingaattackerna mot Frankerriket och skandinavernas ihållande narvaro i frankernas rike och bortom det.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Nar fler an 80 personer dor i narheten av Los Angeles flygplats blir myndigheterna tvungna att forandra sattet planen spåras och overvakas på.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Veronica behover bykvinnornas hjalp for att mota sin radsla att hugga ner stora trad. Sam och Squibb kammar noll med natet och tillgriper sportfiskemetoden for att fånga farsk fisk. Oliver river taket på sitt skjul for att installera regnvattenuppfångning. Carl och Morgan tar annu ett steg med sitt eviga hem genom att anlagga en tradgård från grunden.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Sam hjalper Matt att forbereda sig infor fiskesasongen.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer inleder nya utgravningar I Pompeji for att avsloja berattelser om dem som levde och dog dar. I en kamp mot klockan finner de ett offerkranium, avslojar ledtrådar från en gravkammare och en mumifierad kropp tillhorande en mystiskt rik, frigiven slav, och ger sig in i smala tunnlar under det kommunala badhuset.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Rom var hjartat som styrde over hela Medelhavet for 2000 år sedan, men mycket av romarrikets historia ar holjd i dunkel. Men nu har marinarkeologer gjort fynd utanfor Siciliens kust som kan forklara hur riket kunde expandera och vaxa sig så stort.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: I Miami inleder granspolisen en operation for att spracka en knarkliga och utlamna en misstankt kokainhandlare från Colombia. På Atlanta International Airport beslagtar granspolisen forfalskade lakemedel, medan Mobile Enforcement Team i El Paso tranar sina nyaste rekryter.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Vid en genomsokning av en farja i Puerto Rico hittar poliser flera resvaskor fyllda med kokain. På JFK-flygplatsen upptacker ett team guldsmycken varda en halv miljon dollar. Senare stoppar granspoliser flera resenarer som forsoker smuggla opioidtabletter over den sodra gransen.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Arkeologer utforskar handelserna som omger slaget vid Alamo år 1836 – USA:s mest beromda belagring. Skeppsvrak i Mexikanska golfen berattar om vapensmuggling som forebådar det episka slaget. Arkeologer avslojar fortets ursprungliga struktur, återskapade med datorgrafik, och i San Jacinto avslojar vetenskapliga undersokningar hur Texas – mot alla odds – sakrade sin sjalvstandighet.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz ger sig av till Rochdale for att radda en Opel Manta GTE, en sallsynt tysk klassiker från 80-talet. Bilen tillhor den forre amatorrallyforaren Alan, som alskade sin Manta så hogt att han inte ville gora sig av med den ens nar den korde av vagen.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Killarna tar sig an Mikes Ford Escort RS2000. Efter hans sons olycka, vill Mikes familj återgalda hans osjalviska hangivenhet med Bil SOS behandling.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: Tyskland ar på frammarsch och Hitler har planer på varldsherravalde. Han ser stridsskeppen som den ultimata symbolen for sitt nya Tredje rike, och beordrar två fartyg att byggas om så att de ar storre, kraftfullare och mer bevapnade an någonting tidigare skådat på havet. Men Storbritannien kommer inte att sky några medel forran Hitlers nya megavapen ar forstorda.

programme.title: Nazisternas megabyggen
programme.desc: Nar USA narmar sig Japan år 1944 borjar japanerna anvanda sig av desperata metoder: sjalvmordspiloter och manniskostyrda supertorpeder.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: 79 e.kr intraffar en av historiens storsta katastrofer, vulkanen Vesuvius begravde inte bara Pompeji, utan aven stader och byar runtomkring, under ett tjockt lager aska. Staden Herculaneum låg på vulkanens sluttning. Utgravningar har nu visat att har finns några av romarrikets mest valbevarade skatter. Staden ar mycket mer valbevarad an Pompeji, och bara en fjardedel av staden ar utgravd an.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Katastrofer blir ofta foljden nar internationella lastbilschaufforer forsoker manovrera på norska vintervagar. Bossen Thord ger sig ut for att hjalpa dem. Foraren satte inte på snokedjorna korrekt och fastnade i en farlig svang. Ensamvargen Bjorn ger sig ut till en liknande situation. Bjorn blir arg nar han inser att foraren mycket vårdslost forsokt kora uppfor en kulle utan kedjor.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Livet I Port Protection ar en oandlig utbildning i overlevnadskonst, och invånarna måste anvanda sin egen kreativitet for att anpassa sig.

programme.title: Secret Service Presidentens beskydd
programme.desc: Insatsstyrkan från Secret Service och FBI berattar vad de personligen har fått vara erfara under sitt arbete att skydda USA:s president vid evenemang som kraver hog sakerhet. Dokumentaren tittar narmre på de farligaste ogonblicken i modern tid och undersoker vilka utmaningar som forknippas med att skydda varldens maktigaste man dygnets alla timmar. Tittarna får uppleva några av de viktigaste skyddsuppdragen som har format dagens internationella sakerhetsstrategi, inklusive skildringar från Panama, Marocko, Pakistan och Tbilisi.

programme.title: The New Air Force One: Flying Fortress
programme.desc: Nya Air Force One: Flying Fortress foljer konstruktionen av det nya presidentplanet och hur det forvandlats till en topphemlig kommandocentral.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Nar en pendlarflight till Detroit slutar i en fruktansvard dodsspiral ar det upp till utredarna att avgora orsaken och forhindra att det nånsin upprepas. Nar de genomsoker vraket efter ledtrådar kommer de till ett uppseendevackande resultat.

programme.title: Haverikommisionen
programme.desc: Bara Frank Geibs snabbtankthet raddade Northwest Airlines Flight 85 från en katastrof 2002. Vad var det som gick snett?

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Mitt i natten blir Thord och Erlend skramda nar de forsoker radda en skåpbil som kraschat intill en kyrkogård. Nar de drar skåpbilen uppfor en istackt, brant backe fruktar de att deras nasta destination kommer att vara kyrkogården. Även i soder ger Bjorn nyborjaren Jan Erik en gammaldags lektion i hur man blir en riktig raddningsarbetare.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar en lastbilschauffor blir stående på isen, men vagrar ta emot hjalp från Thord, skapar han kaos på vagen. I norr holl ett sandningsfordon på att sakra vagen nar det också råkade ut for isen. Jo Rogers ar hårt pressad att dra upp sandaren ur diket och få den tillbaka på vagarna, men riskerar att krossa chassit mot vagkanten.

programme.title: Prehistoric Women
programme.desc: Vi foljer videofotografen Clothilde Chamussy och arkeologen Randall Haas nar de studerar vetenskaplig forskning som avslojar ny information om kvinnornas roll i de forhistoriska samhallena.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: Inkarikets episka uppgång borjar med Manco Cápac, den forsta inkan, och Pachacutec – harskaren som omformade hela civilisationen. Pachacutec, som tog titeln ”Solens son”, byggde Machu Picchu, utvidgade sitt rike bortom Cuzco och anvande manniskooffer for att sakra sin makt. Med hjalp av banbrytande vetenskap och fantastiska 3D-rekonstruktioner ger vi oss ut på en hisnande resa genom solimperiets uppgång.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: På jakt efter skatter från tiden for Egyptens mest beromda drottning, Cleopatra, hittar arkeologer en sallsynt guldtunga som forsvunnit i en underjordisk grav. Samtidigt gor ett annat team en hapnadsvackande upptackt – bevis på den forsta parfymfabriken som någonsin hittats i det gamla Egypten. Ledtrådar som hittats i tempel over hela Egypten avslojar hur Kleopatra anvande parfym som ett strategiskt verktyg for att starka sin makt.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Lockerbiekatastrofen var den varsta terroristattacken på amerikaner innan handelserna den 11 september 2001. Vi hor berattelsen om tragedin.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Sam hjalper Matt att forbereda sig infor fiskesasongen.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Sommaren har anlant till Alaska, vilket innebar langre dagar och annu langre att gora-listor. Squibb hjalper Curly fixa till hans ruttnande dack innan någon brakar igenom det. Sam sanker sina gaskostnader med lite lokal uppfinningsrikedom. Matt ger sig ut i sin nyrenoverade fiskebåt ”The Gothic” på jakt efter lax, och Oliver och Breanna beger sig till Totem Bay for att återuppvacka lite minnen.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Rom var hjartat som styrde over hela Medelhavet for 2000 år sedan, men mycket av romarrikets historia ar holjd i dunkel. Men nu har marinarkeologer gjort fynd utanfor Siciliens kust som kan forklara hur riket kunde expandera och vaxa sig så stort.

programme.title: Romarrikets forsvunna skatter
programme.desc: Hur blev Colosseum - en arena for blodiga gladiatorstrider - den storsta symbolen for det romerska riket? Arkeologer vågar sig in i Colosseums ruiner och påborjar gravningar over hela imperiet for att jaga efter ledtrådar. Nar teamen går ner i dolda tunnlar och graver fram sedan lange forsvunna amfiteater i Toscana och Storbritannien, pusslar de ihop den overraskande sanningen om Roms ikoniska Colosseum.

programme.title: Ti på Topp

Men var låten blant de ti mest populære i Norge i 2002, og vil gjestene i så fall by på gjensyn med dansen? Stian Staysman og to heltente og engasjerte lag gir deg svaret. programme.title: Hjem til jul - en intim julekonsert med kjente artister
programme.desc: Vi inviterer til en intim julekonsert på kvelden før selveste julaften. En stemningsfull musikalsk julegave med kjente artister som Maria Mena, Ina Wroldsen, Thomas Dybdahl, Fay Wildhagen, Klovner i kamp, Frida Ånnevik, Carlisle Sienes og koret Oslo Hit Ensemble som synger julen inn og får deg i den rette stemningen.

programme.title: Morda i Port Talbot
programme.desc: Mens 1973-teamet begynner å bli desperate, ser det ut til at 2002-teamet kan treffe blink med DNA-analysen. Men er det nok til å bevise skuld?

programme.title: Morda i Port Talbot
programme.desc: For å komme vidare i etterforskinga, må Paul be om å få opne ei grav. Mykje står på spel, og ikkje alle er sikre på at det er ein god ide.

programme.title: Nissene i skjul
programme.desc: Jentene i alliansen begynner å bli bestevenner, men Birthe lyver til jentene for å redde seg selv. Stian og Anton knytter bånd under fjøsoppgaven.

programme.title: Ping Pong Family
programme.desc: Grunerløkka har Norges mest populære bordtennisbord. Men noen av entusiastene har et noe mer liberalt forhold til rus enn kommunen setter pris på.

programme.title: Nye bein å stå på
programme.desc: Gry Hege ble akutt syk, og gikk fra å være selvstendigheten selv til å bli pleietrengende. Vil hun klare å finne tilbake til gleden ved livet? Norsk dokumentar.

programme.title: Du klarar meir enn du trur
programme.desc: Clara får fire utfordringar av den personlege trenaren Thomas. Først må ho førebu seg mentalt. Kor lenge kan ho sitte i eit badekar med is?

programme.title: Du klarar meir enn du trur
programme.desc: Sjølv trur ikkje Clara at ho hadde klart ein maraton. Det blir ein kamp mot kropp og tankar når Thomas ber ho springe i tolv timar.

programme.title: Du klarar meir enn du trur
programme.desc: Denne utfordringa blir større enn Thomas hadde sett for seg. Ingen kan ro ein konkurransebåt på det første forsøket. Men kanskje Clara kan?

programme.title: Familien Lykke
programme.desc: Pengesak blir prinsippsak. August flytter utenfor.

programme.title: Die Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisas Klassenlehrerin Miss Hoover wird krank. Ihr Vertreter, Mr. Bergstrom, gewinnt mit seinen Lehrmethoden im Handumdrehen Lisas Zuneigung. Doch gerade als Lisa ihren Lieblingslehrer zum Abendessen nach Hause einladen will, kommt Miss Hoover wieder zuruck … Unterdessen hat Bart ein Problem: Er tritt bei der Klassensprecherwahl gegen den Streber Martin an.

programme.title: Die Simpsons
programme.desc: Eine Party bei den Simpsons, und Homer schaut zu tief ins Glas. Er grolt herum und guckt der Nachbarin sogar in den Ausschnitt. Marge findet das gar nicht gut. Sie meldet sich und Homer auf der Stelle zu einem Eheberatungswochenende bei Reverend Lovejoy an. Doch was versteht ein Reverend schon von der Ehe?! Die Beratung wird zu einer Generalanklage gegen Homer. Er stiehlt sich davon - und geht angeln.

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Die beiden Ehepaare Butler und Johnson verabreden sich zu einem gemeinsamen Besuch in einem Soul-Food-Restaurant. Das Essen schmeckt Calvin genau solange, bis er erfahrt, dass es von einem weiSSen Koch zubereitet wurde. Er gerat in Rage und diese Tatsache ist Grund genug fur ihn, das Restaurant zu boykottieren. Tina, Gemma und Dave versuchen, ihn zu beruhigen.

programme.title: Kaminfeuer mit Joko And Klaas
programme.desc: Volle 77 Minuten entspannter und interessanter Talk vor dem Kaminfeuer. In den Hauptrollen: Joko And Klaas. Der Anlass: Eine Strafe im Rahmen von Joko And Klaas gegen ProSieben.

programme.title: taff
programme.desc: Bei taff dreht sich eine Stunde lang alles um die Themen des Tages: die bewegendsten, schonsten, lustigsten und skurrilsten Bilder der letzten 24 Stunden, gut recherchierte Geschichten von Menschen und ihren Schicksalen, die News zu Stars und Sternchen sowie aktuelle Tipps und Trends.

programme.title: Die Cooking Academy
programme.desc: Alexander und Felicitas kehren von ihrem romantischen Kurztrip zuruck, um gemeinsam mit Chris und Irini das Restaurant zu retten. Doch dann passiert ein fataler Fehler. Vater und Sohn arbeiten erstmals Seite an Seite - werden sie die Nerven behalten? Als obendrein auch noch Destinys Mutter mitten in das Chaos platzt und ihrer erkrankten Tochter erneut den eigenen Willen aufzwingen will, verliert Luke die Nerven und schreitet ein.

programme.title: Galileo
programme.desc: SchieSStraining, Taktikubungen, Extremsport - und Meditation? Inside GSG 9 gewahrt einzigartige Einblicke in die Ausbildung der deutschen Anti-Terror-Einheit. Erstmals durfen Kameras die angehenden Elitepolizisten auf ihrem harten Weg zum Einsatzbeamten begleiten. Von SchieSStraining uber Geiselbefreiung bis hin zu Yoga: Welche Rekruten haben das Zeug zum GSG 9-Beamten? Die harteste Prufung steht ihnen noch bevor ...

programme.title: Die Simpsons
programme.desc: Knecht Ruprecht, der eigentlich Bart gehort, entwickelt sich mehr und mehr zu einer Plage: Er macht alles kaputt, randaliert im Garten und frisst alles, was nicht niet- und nagelfest ist. Marge und Homer beschlieSSen, den Hund wegzugeben. SchlieSSlich kann Bart sie breitschlagen – Knecht Ruprecht erhalt noch eine Chance: Er muss sich in einer Hundeschule einem Erziehungslehrgang unterwerfen.

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted, Marshall und Barney widmen sich wieder ihrer „Trilogie-Zeit“, zu der sie sich alle drei Jahre treffen, um zusammen die Star-Wars-Trilogie zu schauen und sich vorzustellen, wie ihr Leben in drei weiteren Jahren aussehen wird. Barney und Quinn ziehen inzwischen zusammen.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Frankie gewinnt eine kostenlose Haushalthilfe fur einen Monat und freut sich uber die Auszeit. Der Haushalt der Familie Heck ist jedoch eine Herausforderung fur sich.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Alan bereitet Walden auf ein Date mit Bridget vor, wahrend Jake wie sein Vorbild Walden die Schule schmeiSSen will.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Um die kurzliche Trennung von seiner Frau zu verarbeiten, sucht Walden eine geeignete neue Partnerin. Alan bekommt die Gelegenheit, sich mit seiner Immer-mal-wieder-Freundin Lyndsey zu versohnen.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Alan kann sich nur schwer mit Lyndseys pikanter Filmvergangenheit arrangieren. Walden will ihn aufmuntern und veranstaltet im Haus eine Party.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Als sich Sheldon im Studentenwohnheim uber eine Party beschweren will, entdeckt er dort seine alte Freundin Paige. Zu seiner Verwunderung trinkt sie Bier und macht sich auf den Weg zur nachsten Feier. Sheldon begleitet sie, um auf sie aufzupassen. Vor Ort stellt er aber erschrocken fest, dass Paige nicht die Einzige ist, die sich heimlich auf die Party geschlichen hat: Missy ist ebenfalls dort.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny hat eine erfolgreiche Verkaufsstrategie fur sich gefunden: Sie flirtet mit den Ärzten und schafft es so, gute Umsatzzahlen zu generieren. Dumm nur, dass einer der Manner ernsthaft an ihr interessiert ist und sie zuhause besucht. Bernadette und Amy geraten indes wegen eines Magazinartikels uber gutaussehende Wissenschaftlerinnen aneinander.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Als Penny ihren Schrank ausmistet, kommt ihr Kleid vom Abschlussball wieder zum Vorschein. Sein Anblick versetzt Bernadette und Amy einen Stich, da sie auf kein romantisches Ballerlebnis zuruckblicken konnen. Kurzerhand beschlieSSen die Freundinnen, mit ihren jetzigen Partner noch einmal einen solchen Tanzabend zu organisieren. Wahrend Howard der Idee wenig Positives abgewinnen kann, genieSSt es Leonard, fur ein paar Stunden seine sensible Seite hervorkehren zu durfen. Am eindruckvollsten aber gestaltet sich der Abend fur Amy und Sheldon.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard erzahlt seinen Freunden, dass er bald einen kleinen operativen Eingriff haben wird. Als Sheldon das hort, macht er sich Sorgen und zahlt Leonard samtliche Risiken auf, die eine Operation birgt. Raj erfahrt indes, dass seine Eltern sich nach fast 40 Jahren scheiden lassen wollen. Wahrend Bernadette ihn trostet, furchtet sie insgeheim, dass ihr und Howard das gleiche Schicksal drohen konnte.

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Gerade als Ted sich allein in seinem neuen Zuhause einzuleben beginnt, versucht Barney, ihn jeden einzelnen Abend zum Ausgehen zu verleiten. Lily hat inzwischen einen unanstandigen Traum uber jemand anderen als Marshall, und Robin wird endlich zur beruhmten Nachrichtenreporterin.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Axl bekommt Panik, als er feststellt, dass er nur noch vier Monate hat, bevor er mit dem College fertig ist und er bisher noch keine einzige Bewerbung verschickt hat.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Walden erhalt die Scheidungspapiere von Bridget, vergisst seine Trauer jedoch, als er eine Frau trifft, die ihr unheimlich ahnlich sieht.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Jake ist verknallt in seine Chemie-Lehrerin - doch die verliebt sich in Walden. Unterdessen beschaftigt sich Alan zwanghaft mit dem Tagebuch, das sein Bruder ihm vermacht hat.

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Als Walden mit der Renovierung des Strandhauses beginnt, reagiert Alan extrem emotional ... und dreht durch.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: Sheldons Datenbank fur Fordergelder soll endlich online gestellt werden. Auf einer Feier soll er offiziell geehrt werden. Allerdings setzen bei Mandy zuvor die Wehen ein. Zusammen mit Nachbarin Brenda Sparks muss Sheldon die Hochschwangere ins Krankenhaus bringen. Nach und nach treffen auch George, Mary und Pastor Rob dort ein. Es dauert nicht lange, bis unter ihnen unterdruckte Eifersuchteleien zum Vorschein kommen.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Raj und Howard raumen das Buro eines verstorbenen Universitatsprofessors auf und werden melancholisch bei dem Gedanken, dass der Mann nie eine groSSe Entdeckung gemacht hat. Sheldon bereitet sich indes auf eine weitere Folge SpaSS mit Flaggen vor und hat als besonderen Gast LeVar Burton eingeladen. Und Penny klart Bernadette daruber auf, dass in der Arbeit alle Angst vor ihr haben.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Da Raj seinen Vater zu Besuch hat, der wegen der Scheidung deprimiert ist, kann er nicht wie ublich das Weihnachtsfest ausrichten. Begeistert ubernimmt Amy diese Aufgabe und ladt die Freunde zu einer traditionellen viktorianischen Weihnachtsfeier ein, bei der die Anwesenden sich zu Tode langweilen. Leonard und Howard arbeiten indes im Reinraum der Universitat und werden von einer Taube gestort.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Wahrend die Damen in einem Laden Klamotten anprobieren, kriegen sich Sheldon und Leonard in die Haare. Das Ergebnis des Streits ist, dass Leonard langsam ausziehen kann und vorerst einen Tag pro Woche bei Penny schlafen soll, damit Sheldon uben kann, alleine in der Wohnung zu bleiben. Raj macht sich indes Sorgen, ob die Raumsonde, an der er vor neun Jahren gearbeitet hat, funktioniert.

programme.desc: Bei taff dreht sich eine Stunde lang alles um die Themen des Tages: die bewegendsten, schonsten, lustigsten und skurrilsten Bilder der letzten 24 Stunden, gut recherchierte Geschichten von Menschen und ihren Schicksalen, die News zu Stars und Sternchen sowie aktuelle Tipps und Trends.

programme.title: Die Simpsons
programme.desc: Am Valentinstag versucht Professor Frink, das Geheimnis der Frauen zu luften. Marge macht sich Sorgen um die Senioren in Grampas Pflegeheim, als sie merkt, dass diese nur unter dem Einfluss von Medikamenten Liebe erfahren.

programme.title: Die Simpsons
programme.desc: Nachdem Bart den Karren einer obdachlosen Frau im Fluss versenkt, erlaubt er ihr, gegen Gebuhr in seinem Schrank zu wohnen. Als Lisa entdeckt, dass die Frau Folksangerin ist, bietet sie ihren eigenen Schrank an und plant ein Konzert, nur um von Hetties Drogenkonsum und Gewalttatigkeit enttauscht zu werden. Inzwischen versucht Homer, handwerkliches Geschick zu beweisen, mauert aber die Katze ein.

programme.title: Galileo
programme.desc: Glitzernde Kugeln, blinkende Lichter und der Duft von Tannennadeln - die Jeromins leben Weihnachten das ganze Jahr. Doch dieses Mal wollen sie ihren eigenen Weltrekord knacken: 650 geschmuckte Weihnachtsbaume sollen in ihrem Einfamilienhaus Platz finden. Galileo begleitet das ehrgeizige Ehepaar sechs Monate lang bei ihrer verruckten Mission. Von der ersten Plastiktanne im Hochsommer bis zum letzten Lametta-Faden kurz vor dem 1. Advent - kann das gutgehen?
